item.description:
If you keep your options open and you believe in networking with millionairres, then this is a MUST BE AT EVENT!

There are few chances in life to meet and pick the brain of a million dollar earners. This Saturday, 10/16/2010 we will me featuring Million Dollar Earners Dr. Monique Vaughn and Vice Chairman, Andre Vaughn. Come to learn how they use our simple 3 step system to make millions. There is NO higher and better use of your time than to spend it learning from a group of millionairres how they got there and the simple system they use to keep the residuals rolling in!

Who's hot in FDI: http://www.youtube.co...

9am - Registration/Networking
10am - Business Overview/Million Dollar Training
Includes Potluck Lunch - Pulled Pork, Chicken wings, Sudaco Dana's Famous Chicken, Clam Chowder, 2 Alarm Chili, White Bean Chili, Vegetarian Casserole, Tossed Salad, Fruit Salad, Hot Pepper jam w/cream cheese and crackers, Chips, Assorted Home-baked goods, Assorted coffees and teas, Assorted sodas and more is being added daily!


Where: 1 Industrial Dr, Windham, NH

RSVP: Call Bernadette at 603-505-8683 or email at Bernadette@BostonAREIA.com
for Free entrance to this event - I only have 3 seats left!
If you can't make the meeting, however you are interested in learning more - schedule an appointment with me today - Meet with Bernadette
item.how_to_find_us: Middle entrance - FDI Training Center, upstairs

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Meet Million Dollar Top Money Earners Dr. Monique and Mr. Andre Vaughn
